梓.definition: Chinese catalpa (Catalpa ovata), a tree that serves as a symbol of one's hometown and whose wood is used to make various items; (bound form) printing blocks

梓潼.definition: Zitong county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan

梓潼縣.definition: Zitong county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan

梓童.definition: (often used in traditional novels) term used by an emperor to address the empress
